org.fcrepo.kernel.services

Interface LockService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service

    public interface LockService
extends Service
    Author:
    Mike Durbin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • Methods inherited from interface org.fcrepo.kernel.services.Service

        exists, setRepository

    • Method Detail

      • acquireLock

        Lock acquireLock(javax.jcr.Session session,
               String path,
               boolean deep)
                 throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Acquires a lock on the node at the given path.
        Parameters:
        session - the session wishing to lock the node/subgraph
        path - the path to be affected
        deep - if true, indicates that the entire subgraph starting at the given path is to be locked
        Returns:
        a Lock object that contains a lock token that will allow other sessions to access resources locked by this call.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

      • getLock

        Lock getLock(javax.jcr.Session session,
           String path)
             throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Gets the lock at the given path. The returned lock will only contain identifying information for sessions holding the lock.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException

      • releaseLock

        void releaseLock(javax.jcr.Session session,
               String path)
                 throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Releases the lock on the node at the given path. This may only be successful if the session holding the lock.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
